scripts.cover: nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary --cache false node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --reporter min --timeout 5000 --recursive lib/*/test/**/*.js && nyc check-coverage
scripts.makeshrinkwrap: rm -rf node_modules npm-shrinkwrap.json && npm install --production --no-save --no-package-lock && npm shrinkwrap --production && node internal/tools/cleanup-shrinkwrap
scripts.prepareRelease: npm run cleanFolders && clean-packages && npm prune --production && ls && cat package.json
scripts.testV2cli: node %NODE_DEBUG_OPTION% cli.js edmxV20ToJsonV40 using.xml ns_entitytype_A=extern_entitytype_A.xml ns_entitytype_B=extern_entitytype_B.xml --directory lib/edmxV20ToJsonV40/test/resources/cli -t _output.json --veryverbose
